# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special price of $11,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the value for your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
